pos_mean_info_list.mean: 培训；训练过的，受过培训的
练习生，实习生；受训者；新兵；训练中的动物
助理教练；训练员；驯马师；飞行练习器

word_mean_info__list.difference: 普通用词，泛指为从事某种职业而进行的身体或智力方面的训练。
指把所学的理论或知识用于实践以获得技艺与技巧。
主要指为强壮体魄而进行的锻炼，也可指进行练习以保持已经获得的技巧。
侧重进行有系统的，严格和重复的练习。
既可指训练又可指为达到某种熟练程度而进行的约束。

word_group.brief_definition: 训练计划；培训计划；培训项目
培训班；训练课程；实习课
教师培训；师资培训；教师训练
训练营；培训营地；训练营地
力量训练；强度训练；肌力训练
进行（或不再进行）锻炼；训练得好；处于良好（或不佳）的竞技状态
进行（或不再进行）锻炼；训练得好；处于良好（或不佳）的竞技状态

bilingual.target: 我们比平时训练得更努力。

bilingual.source: This year we are training more carefully.
bilingual.target: 今年我们训练得更仔细。

bilingual.source: Let's take a break from the training.
bilingual.target: 让我们暂停训练，休息一下。

bilingual.source: Henry is training hard for the big match.
bilingual.target: 亨利正在为大赛努力训练。

bilingual.source: The team is training harder than usual.
bilingual.target: 这个队训练得比平时更努力。

bilingual.source: The school basketball team is training hard.
bilingual.target: 学校篮球队正在努力训练。

bilingual.source: Let's wait for someone with medical training.
bilingual.target: 我们等有医疗训练的人来。

bilingual.source: He announced that he was going to start training too.
bilingual.target: 他宣布他也要开始训练了。

bilingual.source: We are training harder because we want to win.
bilingual.target: 我们训练得更刻苦，因为我们想要获胜。

list.abstract: training，英 [ˈtreɪnɪŋ]，美 [ˈtreɪnɪŋ]。英文单词，作名词，是指训练；培训；锻炼。短语搭配为“training course（培训班；训练课程；实习课）”。例句为“I ran and did strength training.（我跑步并进行力量训练）”。 training近义词为cultivation，education，drilling。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't need training wheels.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不需要辅助训练。

yingyinNormal.en: There are two stages of training.
yingyinNormal.zh: 训练分为两个阶段。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, and you excelled during your service training. Excelled.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当然，你服役训练期间表现突出，出类拔萃。

yingyinNormal.en: Stage two of training is where you are most at risk.
yingyinNormal.zh: 第二阶段的训练是你最危险的时期。

yingyinNormal.en: And this is not an acceptable way to arrive at training.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而这个，来训练而已，用得着这样吗？

yingyinNormal.en: You may resume your duties. Begin training as a combat medic.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你可恢复原职责。作为军医开始训练。

yingyinNormal.en: I told you, we're adding new operators all the time. Could we concentrate on my training?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们有加派接线员，专心训练，好吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Sorry, I'm Norm. Spellman. I went through avatar training with him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 抱歉，我是诺姆斯佩尔曼，我们一起参加的阿凡达项目训练。

yingyinNormal.en: Look, I don't see why I should have to miss out on the coaching training just because I'm a woman.
yingyinNormal.zh: 只因我是个女人，我就得错过教练训练？

yingyinNormal.en: At the end of each stage of training, the lowestranking initiates will be leaving us.
yingyinNormal.zh: 训练的每个阶段，排名倒数的新生们将会离开无畏派。

yingyinNormal.en: Your training begins first thing tomorrow morning. Sergeant Dap will show you to your quarters.
yingyinNormal.zh: 明天一早你的训练就开始了，戴普中士会带你去你的房间。

yingyinNormal.en: I've been training her. To be trained by the master. What have you learned? If you jump in muddy puddles, you must wear your boots.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我已经在训练他了。奥，你在接受大师的训练呢。那你学到了什么。恩，如果你想要去跳泥坑的话。你一定要穿上你的靴子。

yingyinNormal.en: I know you are eager to answer their calls, but your training is not yet complete.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道你们急於给予敌人猛烈的回击，但是你们的训练还没有全部完成。

yingyinNormal.en: Finally, we are conscripting new troops from the north. I have begun preparations for training.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们终于从北方征募了新的军队，我已经着手准备训练他们了。

yingyinNormal.en: My final class because from now on your training will be in the hands of the Dragon Warrior.
yingyinNormal.zh: 之所以是最后一课，是因为接下来负责你们训练的将会是神龙大侠。

yingyinNormal.en: His name's Ngoc Minh Quan. He's armed and has U.S. Special Forces training. Use extreme caution.
yingyinNormal.zh: 姓名关玉明。他持有枪械，接受过美国特种部队训练要格外当心。

yingyinNormal.en: Come on. I got Matt to take the afternoon off from his training and Tyler to give the practice squad a break.
yingyinNormal.zh: 来嘛，我都让马特翘掉下午的训练，让泰勒给练习队放假。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm sure he was very convincing. All Russian diplomats go through FSB counter-intel training.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我相信他一定很令人信服，俄国所有外交官都经过了俄联邦安全局的反情报训练。

yingyinNormal.en: Really, your potty training journal? Yeah. And forgive my crude penmanship. I didn't start typing until I was six.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不是吧，你的如厕训练日志啊。是的，字迹难看，多多包涵，我六岁之后才开始打字。

yingyinNormal.en: So why the hell are you staying here? Is this training for when your looks run out? Oh, look. The kitchen is so cute!
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以你们为啥要来住这？想先为年华老去的未来做准备训练吗？你看，厨房好有爱！

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 训练计划；培训计划；培训项目

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 受培训者；学员；实习生
v. 训练；培养；培训；瞄准；（train的过去式和过去分词）

word_family.mean: v. 训练；对准；瞄准；乘火车；引诱；受训练；对（智能；体能）进行训练；使朝某方向生长；成某形状

examination_example.sentence: That tells me whether I need to adjust my <highlight>training</highlight> program.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这告诉我是否需要调整我的训练计划。

examination_example.sentence: It could make extra <highlight>training</highlight> and instruction affordable.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它可以让额外的培训和指导变得负担得起。

examination_example.sentence: Students who do not need the extra <highlight>training</highlight> could cut their debt mountain by a third.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不需要额外培训的学生可以减少三分之一的债务。

word_usage.usage:
training是不可数名词，指“训练；培训”时，后常接in sth./in doing sth.表示“某方面的培训”。例：
Few candidates had received any training in management.
没有几个应聘者接受过管理培训。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 教员；教练；驯兽师；运动跑鞋；休闲软鞋；教练机；飞行练习器

word_family.mean: v. 训练；对准；瞄准；乘火车；引诱；受训练；对（智能；体能）进行训练；使朝某方向生长；成某形状

examination_example.sentence: We regard these disappointments as a fate we could have avoided with more careful preparation, different <highlight>training</highlight>, a better strategy, or more focus.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们认为，如果有更仔细的准备、不同的训练、更好的策略或更多的专注，我们本可以避免这些失望的命运。

examination_example.sentence: Teachers with a multicultural background or <highlight>training</highlight> could perhaps overcome such curriculum challenges, but they're few and far between.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 拥有多元文化背景或受过培训的教师也许能克服这样的课程挑战，但这样的老师少之又少。

examination_example.sentence: The program will offer patients several bags of food prescribed for their condition, along with intensive <highlight>training</highlight> in how to cook it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该项目将为患者提供几袋针对其病情开出的食物，以及如何烹饪食物的强化培训。

examination_example.sentence: Mark and his teammates often have football <highlight>training</highlight> on the playground.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 马克和他的队友经常在操场上进行足球训练。

examination_example.sentence: If they got better <highlight>training</highlight> and started winning things, they'd soon change their minds.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果他们得到更好的训练并开始赢得胜利，他们很快就会改变主意。

examination_example.sentence: My friends and I joined a two-day survival（生存） <highlight>training</highlight> course in the mountains.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我和我的朋友参加了为期两天的山区生存培训课程。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 主要指为强健体魄而进行的锻炼，也可指为保持已经获得的技巧而进行的练习。
指把所学的理论或知识用于实践，以获得技艺与技巧。
普通用词，泛指身体或智力方面的训练。
指把所学的理论或知识用于实践，以获得技艺与技巧。
